summary: REQ-4 appears implemented via a canonical URL-safe slug ("mujhe-to-tu-psnd-hai") plus path validation logic while continuing to render the Valentine page for all paths. REQ-5 is partially evidenced (share URL helper and copy-related state/imports), but the diff summary does not provide direct evidence that the user-facing share/copy labels are in English.

missing_requirements.requirement: All user-facing UI labels related to sharing/copying are in English.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates a new share/copy section exists, but the provided truncated snippet of ValentinePage does not show the actual rendered labels/text for the share/copy UI, so compliance with the English-only label requirement cannot be verified from the evidence shown.
